mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.service_name, c.name, t1.fee, t1.description,t1.logo from (select s.id, s.service_name, s.fee, s.category_id, s.logo, s.description from subscribe s inner join usersubscribe u on s.id = u.subscribe_id where u.user_id = #{id} ) t1 inner join category c on t1.category_id = c.id
select u.user_id, sum(s.fee) total_fee from subscribe s inner join usersubscribe u on s.id = u.subscribe_id where u.user_id = #{id} group by u.user_id
select s.id, s.service_name, c.name, s.fee, s.description ,s.logo from subscribe s inner join category c on s.category_id = c.id where s.id = #{id}
